    • Method Detail

      • upsample

        public static org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F upsample(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F matrix,
                                                    int scale)
        Function creates larger larger matrix specified by scale factor. Currently supports integer scale factor
        Parameters:
        matrix - DenseMatrix64F input matrix
        scale - integer scaling factor
        Returns:
        DenseMatrix64F up-sampled matrix. If scale parameter is given negative null matrix is returned. Double scale factors are trimmed to integers

      • upsampleRows

        public static org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F upsampleRows(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F matrix,
                                                        int scale)
        Function creates larger matrix by specified scale factor row wise. New values are filled with zeros
        Parameters:
        matrix - DenseMatrix64F input matrix
        scale - integer scale factor
        Returns:
        DenseMatrix64F up-sampled matrix

      • upsampleRows

        public static org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F upsampleRows(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F matrix,
                                                        int scale,
                                                        int offset)
        Function creates larger matrix by specified scale factor row wise. Allows specifying phase for which to offset data New values are filled with zeros
        Parameters:
        matrix - DenseMatrix64F input matrix
        scale - integer scale factor
        offset - integer specifying offset by which original data is offset must be in range (0 scale-1) otherwise null is returned
        Returns:
        DenseMatrix64F up-sampled matrix

      • upsampleCols

        public static org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F upsampleCols(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F matrix,
                                                        int scale,
                                                        int offset)
        Function creates larger matrix by specified scale factor column wise. Allows specifying phase by which to offset data New values are filled with zeros
        Parameters:
        matrix - DenseMatrix64F input matrix
        scale - integer scale factor
        offset - integer specifying offset by which original data if offset must be in range (0, scale -1) otherwise null is returned
        Returns:
        DenseMatrix64F up-sampled matrix

      • upsampleCols

        public static org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F upsampleCols(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F matrix,

        Function creates larger matrix by specified scale factor column wise. New values are filled with zeros
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        DenseMatrix64F up-sampled matrix

      • biCubic

        public static double biCubic(double x,
                             double a)
        Function for bicubic convolution kernel value generation From paper: R. Keys, (1981). "Cubic convolution interpolation for digital image processing". IEEE Transactions on Acoustics, Speech, and Signal Processing. The kernel function is defined with following equations: h(x)={(a+2)|x|^3-(a+3)|x|^2+1, for |x|<=1, {a|x|^3-5a|x|^2+8a|x|-4a}, for 1<|x|<2. {0, otherwise}
        Parameters:
        x - argument for kernel function.
        a - parameter for bicubic function modification
        Returns:
        double kernel value for given x

      • generateBicubKernel

        public static org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F generateBicubKernel(int scale)
        Function constructs interpolation kernel
        Parameters:
        scale - scale parameter
        Returns:
        scaled version of original matrix

      • imResize

        public static org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F imResize(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F matrix,
                                                    int scaleFactor)
        Function for image resizing. Currently performs Bicubic Convolution interpolation, and Provides only integer scale parameters greater that one.
        Parameters:
        matrix - DenseMatrix64F matrix representing input image
        scaleFactor - - integer number representing scale factor
        Returns:
        DenseMatrix64F returns resized version of input image
